about_the_game:
About the Game
Immerse yourself in a world where Apex AI is the predominant force of nature. Explore the boundaries of consciousness, fight through enemies, navigate degraded landscapes, and confront unfamiliar yet vicious robotic lifeforms to discover and fulfill your objective. Dive into a world with a rich history and deep story-driven action. Resetna is a gripping 2.5D Metroidvania adventure that will keep you on the edge of your seat.


Explore the World
Navigate and survive through hostile and imaginative territories such as Polis 13, a devastated robotic city, Acidia, Vault, and many other intriguing regions where you'll explore, gather data, and fiercely fight for survival.


Weapons and Combat
Collect and exchange weapons as necessary, adapting to the challenges you are currently facing. Switch between an axe, sword, or spear. Utilize the full potential of each weapon using the power of the Overclock ability, enabling Resetna to deal a great amount of damage to foes in a very short amount of time. Battle against forty different types of unique enemies with various abilities and face seven main bosses, each shrouded in its own mystery.


Abilities and Companion
Utilize your hacking abilities such as stun, stealth, detonation, and chain lightning. Additionally, you will have abilities that enhance your mobility, such as warp, double jump, wall jump, and dash. Your faithful companion drone, IXA, will scan environmental data for you and provide healing.

System Upgrade
You will operate on a special type of CHIP upgrade system that you can enhance by manipulating geometric shapes. Your highly customizable system will allow you to modify your strategy by slotting in chips to enhance combat or exploration abilities. The chips not only provide statistical upgrades but also unlock special skills within the abilities and weapons themselves, altering how each of them functions.

About you
You are Resetna, a new species of android whose existence is tied to a secret objective. Your mission won't always be straightforward, as the forces guiding you may sometimes impede your progress. Alongside your faithful drone-companion Ixa and numerous other allies you will encounter, you will refuse to surrender, detest defeat, in your relentless fight to ignite the light of a new world.

name: ReSetna Demo
short_description: Take part in the genesis of a new era of consciousness, where humanity and robots have fused into a new species. Resetna, a post-apocalyptic sci-fi metroidvania, delivers thrilling adventures, intense combat, and immersive gameplay.
